Transcript: Hello, it's Sandy calling from Sears Portrait Studio. I know your little one will be celebrating a birthday soon, and I'm calling to remind you to book a photography session to help capture this special moment. And if you book your appointment within 2 weeks, you'll receive an extra 8 by 10 color portrait absolutely free with your purchase. Remember, portraits and sears are a great way to mark your child's birthday, and portraits make wonderful gifts, especially for grandparents.
